com.netflix.servo.publish

Class MetricTransformObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.servo.publish.MetricTransformObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetricObserver

    public class MetricTransformObserver
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetricObserver
    An observer that will transform the list of metrics using a given function.
